items.content_html: chargecalc is a lightweight React application designed to simplify the calculation of fortnightly rent and additional charges for tenants. Whether billing by weekly or nightly rates, including optional Glenn Dining fees, or processing refunds, this tool provides an easy, error-free way to compute tenant charges for any arbitrary billing period.

Whether billing by weekly or nightly rates, including optional Glenn Dining fees, or processing refunds, this tool provides an easy, error-free way to compute tenant charges for any arbitrary billing period.
